document.docAuthor: Lowry, J. K. & Kilgallen, N. M.
document.masterDocTitle: A generic review of the lysianassoid family Uristidae and descriptions of new taxa from Australian waters (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Uristidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A generic review of the lysianassoid family Uristidae and descriptions of new taxa from Australian waters (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Uristidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality.
Face of outer barrier between Dam Awan (Rasch Passage) and Wongad , Astrolabe Bay , Papua New Guinea ( 5°08.59’S 145°49.65’E ),
290 m depth
.

Feeding strategies. Ascavenger taken in baited traps.

Distribution .
Papua New Guinea .
Madang Lagoon and Astrolabe Bay (Lowry & Stoddart 1995).
Australia .
East coast from Queensland to Tasmania ( Lowry & Stoddart 2009 , this study).
